properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 10:21PM EST until February 12 at 4:36AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Etowah River near Dawsonville  affecting Dawson and Forsyth
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Etowah River near Dawsonville .
* From late tonight until late Tuesday night.
* At 10 PM Monday the stage was 12.1 feet, and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 13 feet.
* The river is forecast to rise above flood stage by after midnight
and continue to rise to near 14.2 feet by tomorrow early
afternoon. The river will fall below flood stage by tomorrow late
evening.
* At 12 feet, Minor flooding of Nicholson Road in northwest Forsyth
county begins.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
